title: A sans to pair with Filosofia?
content:
Any suggestions for a sans serif to pair with Filosofia (just using Small Caps and Roman, **not** Unicase).

Thanks so much!
author: mauphie

comments.content: What is your project? Who is your audience?

I'm in the process of updating my identity (going to start looking for a new job).

I've been using Filosofia Small Caps and as I'm pulling everything together I realize that I need a sans, merely to add some contrast. Obviously I will not be setting vast amounts of text....

I'm in the process of updating my identity (going to start looking for a new job).

I've been using Filosofia Small Caps and as I'm pulling everything together I realize that I need a sans, merely to add some contrast. Obviously I will not be setting vast amounts of text....
Didn't AIGA use Interstate and Filosofia? I liked contrast of neo-grotesque and ink-squashy romantic. Though I'd avoid that specific combo, of course.

thanks for the input.

i had not thought about Frutiger.... Sometime you just miss some obvious ideas. that's why i like coming on to this forum.

thanks everyone!
